author: achapman
title: Chelsea transfer news: Eden Hazard will NOT be sold to Real Madrid with club keen to keep Antonio Conte happy
text:
EFL Blues' Ed-ache Chelsea transfer news: Eden Hazard will NOT be sold to Real Madrid with club keen to keep Antonio Conte happy 
Blues are desperate to tie their boss down to a new contract and don't want transfer links to unsettle their high morale By Anthony Chapman
